source.6caeec47: General formula of multi-linear reg is:y=m1x1+m2x2+...+mnxn. where,m=slope,c=intercept
source.0f753dba: We are going to predict Y dependent on X(x1-x4) using Multiple Linear Regression.
source.0b75d29c: X is a independent variable which consits of independent entites such as transaction date,house age,dist to nearest MRT station etc.
source.af8322f9: Random state is used to shuffle the data each time when it is executed.
source.cb6ca8c1: * Note:Latitute & longitude(x5 &x6) are not considered in this code.
source.2d9aa890: df1 is a variable name dataframe1 which stores non-null values of the data
source.e172805b: Consider some random values of x1,x2,x3,x4 and predict y for those values.
source.7f22ffb0: Y is an dependent data that is house price of unit area which is dependent on all the independent factors.
source.838b3f5d: Any machine learning model requires training before testing.
source.907020a4: Here,test data is considered as 30% & train data is taken as 70%.
